auto_merge.commit_message:
Fix type inference on prange target when the type of the arguments to
prange needs inferring themselves.

Fixes #6974

repo.description: The most widely used Python to C compiler
repo.name: cython

body:
Fix type inference on prange target when the type of the arguments to prange needs infering themselves.

Fixes #6974

comment_data.body:
Rather than adding a special case here, could we maybe embed the args into `node.iterator` somehow? That's traversed already and is currently a `PassStatNode`, which makes as little sense as anything else we could come up with.
https://github.com/cython/cython/blob/91b95ad076f326b284921d2bada8cd22f38aeb4e/Cython/Compiler/Nodes.py#L10358
comment_data.diff_hunk:
@@ -1071,6 +1071,9 @@ def visit_ForInStatNode(self, node):
         # Condition with iterator
         self.flow.loops.append(LoopDescr(next_block, condition_block))
         self._visit(node.iterator)
+        if isinstance(node, Nodes.ParallelRangeNode):
+            for arg in node.args:
+                self._visit(arg)

@@ -10352,10 +10352,14 @@ class ParallelRangeNode(ParallelStatNode):
 
     valid_keyword_arguments = ['schedule', 'nogil', 'num_threads', 'chunksize', 'use_threads_if']
 
+    class DummyIteratorNode(Node):
+        child_attrs = ["args"]
+
     def __init__(self, pos, **kwds):
         super().__init__(pos, **kwds)
-        # Pretend to be a ForInStatNode for control flow analysis
-        self.iterator = PassStatNode(pos)
+        # Pretend to be a ForInStatNode for control flow analysis,
+        # ensuring that the args get visited when the iterator would be.
+        self.iterator = ParallelRangeNode.DummyIteratorNode(pos, args=self.args)

comment_data.body: Do you think this comment is helpful? It seems displaced to me now.
comment_data.diff_hunk:
@@ -1070,6 +1070,7 @@ def visit_ForInStatNode(self, node):
         next_block = self.flow.newblock()
         # Condition with iterator
         self.flow.loops.append(LoopDescr(next_block, condition_block))
+        # For ParallelRangeNode, args are hidden in node.iterator

commit.message:
Fix two-step prange type inference

Fix type inference on prange target when the type of the arguments
to prange needs infering themselves.

Fixes #6974
